chapter.title: Quick search
chapter.para: There are various ways to make searches in PMB. Quick search is the default search mode.

section.title: Choosing fields to search
section.para: Quick search is set by default to titles and authors in PMB. You can specify one or several fields to search from the following fields :
If you do not indicate any fields, the search will be made using the default option, that is, titles and authors.
Warning. if you are looking for the title of part of a work (cd track, a short story in a compilation, a poem from an anthology, ....) check the text box "summary and notes" as well.

section.title: Number of results
section.para: Quick search in PMB processes your search criteria for each of the fields selected.

figure.title: Number of results for a search

section.para: To display search results, click on display.
